document-screen.archived-group-features-label: What you can do with archived groups

plan-screen.title: License Information
plan-screen.free-license: You are using a one year free license, which will end on 31/12/2020. Other licenses information will be available soon.
plan-screen.basic-plan-label-subtitle: With our basic plan, you can snap maximum 10 receipts per month and generate 2 groups.
plan-screen.premium-plan-label-subtitle: You will get unlimited snaps and groups.

receipt-card.unknown-category: Click 'Review' button to select receipt category.
receipt-card.receipt-processed-review: Click 'Review' button to verify and fulfill receipt data.
receipt-card.receipt-in-process-review: Click 'Review' button to verify and fulfill receipt data.

upload-result-dialog.title: Receipt has been saved
upload-result-dialog.success-message: Receipt is being listed in Receipts/Reviewed tab.

upload-receipt-screen.submitting-label: Submitting receipt, will be ready soon ...
upload-receipt-screen.unknown-error-label: Unknown error encountered when submitting the receipt, please resubmit the receipt.
upload-receipt-screen.extract-text-failed-message:
The receipt has been submitted, but failed to extract the text from the image. Please double check whether this is a valid receipt.

Press 'Review Now' button to manually enter receipt information now.
Press 'Review Later' button to review the receipt later, which is listed in 'Receipts\Unreviewed' tab.
upload-receipt-screen.maybe-not-valid-message:
This maybe not a valid receipt. Please double check.

Press 'Review Now' button to manually enter receipt information now.
Press 'Review Later' button to review the receipt later, which is listed in 'Receipts\Unreviewed' tab.
upload-receipt-screen.unrecognized-format-message:
The receipt image has been submitted.

Press 'Review Now' button to manually enter receipt information now.
Press 'Review Later' button to review the receipt later, which is listed in 'Receipts\Unreviewed' tab.
upload-receipt-screen.recognized-success-message:
The receipt image has been submitted.

Press 'Review Now' button to verify receipt information now.
Press 'Review Later' button to review the receipt later, which is listed in 'Receipts\Unreviewed' tab.
upload-receipt-screen.general-error-message: Error encountered when submitting the receipt:

add-receipts-screen.receipt-added-fail: Error: Receipt data not found, could not be added to group
